description: Tapestry: La Collation, from L'Histoire de l'empereur de la Chine Series; After cartoons by Guy-Louis Vernansal (French, 1648 - 1729), and Jean-Baptiste Monnoyer (French, 1636 - 1699), and Jean-Baptiste Belin de Fontenay (French, 1653 - 1715), et al; Beauvais, France; 1697 to 1705; Wool and silk; 309.9 × 422.9 cm (122 × 166 1/2 in.); 83.DD.336; J.
